sub_title: Senior Consultant | Master in Big Data & Business Intelligence | PGDip Coaching and NLP | SAFe® 5 APM | SAFe® 5 POPM | SAFe® 5 SP |
summary: An enthusiastic strategist by inclination and analyst by profession, who enjoys creating delightful experiences for clients. Able to work well on own initiative and can demonstrate the high levels of motivation required to meet the tightest of deadlines. Even under significant pressure, possesses a strong ability to perform effectively both on an individual level as well as in a team. Driven by quality and customer satisfaction, always able and willing to go the extra mile to get the job done. I am an ENTJ personality - The Commander: Visionary, Gregarious, Project-oriented, Self-confident.

profile_positions.location: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
profile_positions.description:
In my role as Senior Manager within Nedbank Digital, I oversee 3 delivery streams to seamlessly and continually deliver quality digital enterprise solutions on time and on budget. Main responsibilities: 

• Lead one of the most significant projects in the bank’s digital strategy
• Manage a full stack delivery team that is located in multiple geographies
• Mentor identified future leaders
• Establish and maintain strong ongoing relationships with service providers and consulting firms
• Manage vendor contracts on an ongoing basis
• Track benefits on delivered projects and produce reports for execs
• Build strong rapport with internal divisional heads and their management teams
• As Product Owner within an enablement environment, my role was to deliver a capability that would enable the business to meet its financial objectives while reducing the costs of servicing clients digitally. 
• Identifying and understanding the problem statements and opportunities said problems created
• Prepared business cases for presentation to the funding board.
• Prepared and review vendor and supplier contracts.
• Analyzed tagged metrics in Adobe Analytics to ensure the correct features were prioritized.
• Contribute to user (A/B) testing and review results for the client value proposition.
• Collaboration with other squads to innovate quicker on shared platforms.
• Creating and prioritizing stories for features.
• Measuring and tracking product performance, creating and presenting monthly EXCO reports.
• Daily stand-ups and availability to unblock any requirement or priority issues.
• Prepare and present Quarterly Business Report to review board (BREXCO).
• Managing and maintaining solid relationships with vendors and suppliers.
• Constantly analyze industry trends and act quickly on opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager: Retail & Business Banking Digital

profile_positions.description:
I currently lead an agile digital delivery tribe consisting of three full stack squads across multiple geographies. 

Over and above the management of the delivery squads, I am also responsible for:

- Identifying problems and opportunities and prepare business cases for presentation to funding board
- Source full stack agile delivery skills for the squad
- Preparation and review of vendor and supplier contracts
- Constantly analyze data from tagged metrics in order to ensure that the correct features are prioritized
- Contribute into user (A/B) testing and review results for client value prioritization
- Management of both internal and external stakeholders 
- Collaboration with other squads to innovate quicker on shared platforms
- Creating and prioritizing stories for features
- Measuring and tracking product performance, creating and presenting monthly EXCO reports
- Daily stand ups and constant availability to unblock any requirement or priority issues
- Prepare and present Quarterly Business Report to review board
- Managing and maintaining solid relationships with vendors and suppliers. 
- Constantly analyze industry trends and act quickly on opportunities 

What have I learned:
I have learned to use data analytics to inform and influence decision making.  

Preparing and presenting business cases to funding board have taught me to consider failure and possible corrective measures or exit strategies. 

Managing multicultural teams located across geographies and time zones. 

Deliver complex projects. 

My contribution: 
As one of the senior members of the agile delivery teams, I 
- mentor and assist new squads.
- contribute to the Client Centered Design (CCD) delivery process.
profile_positions.title: Digital Product Owner / Agile Tribe Lead

profile_positions.description:
Senior Business Analyst Specialist - Mobile and Digital Delivery
As a senior specialist BA in the bank, I am responsible for leading teams to deliver on enterprise digital projects. 

On agile projects where more urgent delivery is a priority I have served in multiple roles depending on the nature and size of the project, from Scrum Master, Product Owner proxy, to Product Owner.

With the recent introduction of delivery Tribes, I have been given the responsibility of Squad Lead. As the Squad Lead, I am responsible for a full-stack team of 20, that spans both on-shore (South Africa) and off-shore (India). This team works independently to delivery within the boundaries of the organisation's digital strategy.

My responsibilities include, but not limited to: Obtaining a list of products or required enhancements from business, Prioritising the delivery of the products or enhancements, Allocating work to the squad Business Analysts, UX / UI designers, Assisting on removing any blockers that may arise, Reviewing analysis work done by the BA's, Reviewing designs by the UX and UI team, Reviewing user testing of UX designs, Grooming of backlog, Putting together a delivery plan to be presented to executives.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst Specialist

profile_positions.description:
I began my role began as a Business Analyst and grew to Manager. Performed business analysis functions on the AA Autobay project. Delivered a learning and development platform for call center staff at Merchants. Main responsibilities include:

• Worked in collaboration with Microsoft to deliver an Office-based reporting addon for Barnard Jacobs Mellete (BJM) Securities
• Managed the rebranding of the XDS website as well as upgrading of some of their services from web services to API’s
• Contributed to the Home Affairs online application system
• Managed analysis, testing, implementation and support of the eFiling revenue collections system
• Collaborated with other vendors on the project in order to deliver complete solutions	
• Worked closely with the South African Revenue Services (SARS) senior management team
• Preparing weekly Steerco / Opsco reports and Project Status updates to execs and management. 
• Managed relationships with Independent Software Vendors (ISV) and their release cycles onto the eFiling platform in line with SARS broader delivery plan.

profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description: I have been involved in HIV/AIDS awareness programmes in the Johannessburg area. Currently I lead a team of volunteers on a SHIELD programme within the Zandspruit Informal Settlement in Honeydew, Johannesburg that assists vulnerable families with basic needs together with tailoring and executing a plan to help them out of their situation, through education and job placements (wherever possible)
